product.title: Bird Garden Lavender - Roman Blind
product.description: On a distressed-look lilac base sit dainty birds and beautiful florals in the sweetly vintage bird garden lavender. The distinctive print adds charm and character, whilst the hue is one of wistful romance and calming tranquility. Craft yourself a peaceful realm to call your own by blending the lavender with matching soft whites in the master bedroom. Use varying shades of purple, such as lilac, heather, and aubergine, to emphasise the shades in the blind.
